definitions: a situation that is extremely serious and involves the risk of dying
an issue of urgent importance where the consequences of failure are catastrophic
examples: Please hurry with the medicine; this is a matter of life and death.
We must reach the coast before the storm hits; this is a matter of life and death.
lemma: be a matter of life and death
synonyms: a case of sink or swim
source: this is a matter of life and death
